body.name: Inflatable Seat Cushions for Pressure Relief, Wheelchair Air Cushion for Bed Sore, Ideal for Prolonged Sitting 17.7" X 17.7"…
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 23 hrs 47 mins
features: 【Flocking fabric】 2 times thicker than ordinary PVC fabric, comfortable and breathable, durable. Not easy to durty, stains only need to be wiped off with a damp cloth. Flocking fabrics are easier to absorb water than PVC fabrics, PVC can be wiped dry directly, and flocking needs to be dried

【Good air-tightness】 Transparent PVC gas-filled holes, reserved outer ring and inner edges of the hole, heat-sealing technology is used to improve sealing. The stitches are fine and do not jump, and the feet are fine and not easy to leak. After many pressure tests, the air tightness is strong.

【Easy to inflate】 Upgrade the pump, the diameter and length of the pump are larger than the old model, the piston and the pump fit more closely, the pump is more labor-saving than the old model, and the handle is equipped with a basketball pump.

【Recommended by medical professionals】 Our air-cushion wheelchairs are made of hypoallergenic hospital-grade materials and are the preferred seat cushion recommended by medical professionals. Adopt high-temperature hot pressing and porous design to disperse the pressure of the seat body and accelerate air dredging.
【Use scene】 Wheelchair; office chair; car; travel; stadium. Can be used for seat cushions or backrests to enhance heat dissipation and ventilation and reduce the pressure on the hips and back

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: What is the difference between flocking fabric and PVC fabric The flocking fabric is more comfortable and close to the skin, which is based on the PVS fabric and adds the flocking process Compared with PVC in color, it will look more high-end and durable

Recommended by medical professionals Our air-cushion wheelchairs are made of hypoallergenic hospital-grade materials and are the preferred seat cushion recommended by medical professionals. Adopt high-temperature hot pressing and porous design to disperse the pressure of the seat body and accelerate air dredging.

Enhanced pump （Included） Our enhanced pump is larger in length and thickness than ordinary pumps, which can save time and energy for pumping. More importantly, we have found from past experience that many small red pumps issued by consumers are easily damaged or even unusable after signing for it. This is very bad. The new pump has better quality, more stable structure, and is equipped with a basketball pump

How long does it take to inflate It takes 3-5 minutes to inflate When deflating, please pinch the air inlet to squeeze the cushion The same way as the deflation of the swimming ring How long can it be used after full gas At least half a month Poke the air intake holes will cause air leakage and shorten the duration of the cushion inflating Dimensions and weight after folding 6.3 X4.3 X1.2 inch 8 oz

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: A similar pillow was used in the hospital for my husband and they gave it to him to take home. Theirs did not have a way to inflate it, so when it went flat I found this similar item on Amazon and ordered it. After a few weeks of use it also went flat because of a small puncture. I tried to patch it but it didn't hold. I then ordered 2 more so I would have a spare in case one developed a leak. He uses this pillow to relieve some of the soreness of sitting while he is undergoing wound care. He takes it everywhere including driving. I wish it was a little more durable, but it's inexpensive to replace, so that is a plus. I recommend this product for medical use and for comfort.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Ordered this for my 91-year-old mom. Her tailbone hurts when she sits in her recliner, so this has helped greatly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Excellent quality but smaller then I expected.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Hard Pass … Not worth it if was free
reviews.reviewText: Don’t waste your time or the five + dollars. This product is a waste of time and money. It’s very difficult to fill the pillow with air. Didn’t even receive the upgraded pump. I got the cheap red one. Product worked great for a week or so of light use, then got a pin hole in a seam allowing it to deflate. Tried two of these with same results. Hard pass on this item.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cheap and effective
reviews.reviewText: My wife has major tailbone issues and it hurts her severely to take a bath so I bought this to try since it was inexpensive and made of the PVC vinyl material and it is a miracle for her, at 170-180lbs it has made it very comfortable and pain free for her to take a bath, we haven't had any issues with air loss or it busting thus far. I personally highly recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It does not inflate much. Not providing much cushion

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Seat air cushion
reviews.reviewText: Comes with it's own hand held air pump. Great for wheelchair use or for those who have desk jobs. It's not bulky when filled up and can be used almost anywhere to give your tush a soft seat that also is good for it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Too thin and hard when blown up and so that you can’t partially inflate it or you will still fill the seat beneath it.
